title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.170 - Inventory valuation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.170 - Inventory valuation

State Regulations

The determination of the costs or the portion of cost
assignable to on-hand raw materials, merchandise held for resale, and supplies
based on any generally accepted method consistently applied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.170

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
